Counter-Strike: Source культовая в своем жанре, к сожалению убивает большое кол-во времени всего человечетства, а некоторых и вовсе делает дебилами, как ни в какой другой игре. Здесь человек хочет больше удовлетворить свое эго, чем получить удовольствие от игры.
Игре я ставлю " + ", но людям которые в нее играют, это только " - ", ибо самообладания с игрой у них нет (надеюсь большинство меня поймут о чем я).

Probably the best Counter Strike ever!
SO MUCH BETTER THAN CS GO!
Been playing Counter-Strike since 1999 and this is the best one by far.

CS:GO focused so much on being competitive, it forgot to be fun.

CS:S however is just an enjoyable game, no matter your skill level. No need to binge watch youtube tutorials just to stand a chance against all the smurfs in silver rank. Just download, click play, and join a server. That's it. 

Oh, and the aiming and movement feel much smoother and the guns feel more reliable and responsive. That's probably just engine differences and not a difference in the games themselves, but CS:S simply feels smoother to play and is less frustrating as a result. The game is also better balanced and every gun is worth using at most points of the match, unlike CS:GO where outside of eco rounds you'll never touch anything but the AK, M4 and AWP, because everything else got nerfed to hell in favor of being "cheap".

CS:GO might be the better "sport", but this is the better game. Period.
